# DictationTranscriber.ResultAttributeOption.audioTimeRange

**Case**

Includes time-code attributes in a transcription’s attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
case audioTimeRange
```

## Discussion

These are `Foundation/AttributeScopes/SpeechAttributes/TimeRangeAttribute` attributes.

## Result attribute options

- **DictationTranscriber.ResultAttributeOption.transcriptionConfidence**: Includes confidence attributes in a transcription’s attributed string.
